publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2404 Johann Lamont:The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Housing Support Grant ( Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm*

S2M-2404 Johann Lamont:The Draft Housing Support Grant ( Scotland) Order 2005—That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Housing Support Grant ( Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm
